title: Like No Udder Vegan Ice Cream
description: Mobile truck turned brick-and-mortar at this location starting spring 2016. In addition to soy based soft serve, this vegan ice cream shop features 12 flavors of hard ice cream made from a variety of bases - cashew, peanut, coconut. Offers ice cream soda floats, shakes, and unicorns (soft serve with the toppings whipped in.). Also sells vegan candy bars, jerky, and other snacks. Hours vary with the seasons - call ahead.
